originalText.text:
Dr. Lim is an amazing orthodontist. Loved being her patient. Staff is wonderful and a great office.
She has treated a lot of my friends and coworkers  they all love her.  I highly recommend her to EVERYONE!!

text.text:
Dr. Lim is an amazing orthodontist. Loved being her patient. Staff is wonderful and a great office.
She has treated a lot of my friends and coworkers  they all love her.  I highly recommend her to EVERYONE!!

originalText.text: This place is so unprofessional. The doctor is very rude to her patients. She threatens her patients and is so rough when working. She is so cheap, and only cares about money. She over prices tremendously. She will start an argument over the patient having to pay $2 for rubber bands (while they r literally spending thousands on the braces) she is careless and rushes tremendously while working. I’ve had to come back many times as my braces left marks, and stopped the blood circulation to my gums, and leaving me in so much pain and discomfort for weeks. All because she rushes and is careless. In the beginning she only puts the brackets on without anything, so that you come back another time and she makes more money. There is so much more I can say. DO NOT COME HERE!

originalText.text: Dr. Lim is incredible! She strives for perfection and expects the highest commitment from her patients. She explained all the options for our son’s treatment which saved us a lot of money and prevented unnecessary discomfort for him.  Highly recommended!

text.text: Dr. Lim is incredible! She strives for perfection and expects the highest commitment from her patients. She explained all the options for our son’s treatment which saved us a lot of money and prevented unnecessary discomfort for him.  Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Jillian is very unprofessional nd a scam artist ! … I was told my health insurance wasn’t active and she tried to terminate my braces trial ,only to find out my insurance was definitely active and she was in fact still being paid! My braces was neglected for over two years because other orthodontist didn’t want to touch her work I then went to her to tell her to continue my trial and she was highly disrespectful  about it due to serious medical issues I couldn’t attend two appointments she was notified and told to reschedule , she then threatened me and proceeded to tell me she doesn’t want to hear any excuses and that  I should’ve never missed appointments she then tells me Ill have to pay out of pocket to remove the braces due to the damage she caused please I advise everyone to not go here I wouldn’t want anyone going through the stress and pain she caused to me nd many other past patients this place needs to be shut down ! I’ve made many complaints in the past but nothing was done .

I’ve made many complaints in the past but nothing was done .

originalText.text: Highly recommend Dr. Lim to anyone.  I took my first child to see her a number of years ago.  Her teeth were terribly crooked.  Dr. Lim put together a specific plan and patiently worked to straighten her teeth perfectly.  I now have my second child being treated by Dr, Lim.  Great Orthodontist who has been in the neighborhood a long time and has treated most of the neighborhoods children.
